# fl-spinner

This is a spinner that can be used as a loading indicator.

## Examples

<fl-spinner size='medium'></fl-spinner>

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type                             | Default    |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | -------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `size`   | `size`    |             | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `"medium"` |
